title: Sullivan's Trace
description: Micah Sullivan (Sully) returns home after the death of her father to run the family horse business. Sully’s life begins to change when childhood friend, Bryn Barton moves in next door to take over her grandfather’s vet practice. A wild dog attacks one of her prized foals. As Sully and Bryn fight for the animal’s survival a romantic relationship begins to grow.
author: Ali Spooner
